types.html:
laisser la parole

  1. to give the floor to, to let (someone) speak [with à ‘someone’]
    Synonyms: donner la parole, céder la parole, passer la parole
trans: to give the floor to, to let  speak .mw-parser-output .object-usage-tag{font-style:italic}.mw-parser-output .deprecated{color:olivedrab}
